admin.menu.title: ![](%s) Administration
admin.menu.doorsDescription: Create or manage door and gate locks on the server.
admin.menu.blipsDescription: Create or manage all blips. You can copy settings from an existing one.
admin.menu.stashesDescription: Create or manage server stashes. You can restrict them by permissions or password.
admin.menu.npcDescription: Create or manage server NPCs. You can add animations to them.
admin.menu.propsDescription: Create or manage server props. You can edit and create scenes.
admin.menu.elevatorsDescription: Create or manage elevators. You can add as many floors as needed.
admin.menu.postersDescription: Create or manage server billboards or images. You can add or remove them.
admin.menu.craftingDescription: Create or manage crafting tables on the server. You can use props for the table.
admin.menu.jobsDescription: Create or manage groups, jobs, and factions (Jobs and Gangs) in-game.
admin.menu.garagesDescription: Create or manage server garages. You can define all options in-game.
admin.menu.groupsDescription: Create or manage groups, jobs, and factions (Jobs and Gangs) in-game.

time.menu.title: Manage Time
time.dialog.timescaleDescription: How long will 1 in-game minute take (e.g., 3000 = every 3 seconds 1 minute passes)
time.menu.timescaleDescription:
Adjust the server time scale.
**Current value**: %s
*/timescale [ms]*
time.menu.freezeDescription:
Freeze or unfreeze server time.
**Active**: %s
*/freezetime [1 or 0]*
error.admin.menu.notAllowedDescription: You do not have permission to perform this action.
